languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс буравит взглядом человечка. Наконец, окончательно все решив, переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Это подданный твоего мира, {name}. Тебе решать его судьбу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс переводит вопросительный взгляд на вас.{/n} "Что ты собираешься сделать с этим человеком?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс буравит взглядом человечка. Наконец, окончательно все решив, переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Это подданный твоего мира, {name}. Тебе решать его судьбу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns his gaze to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns his gaze to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns his gaze to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希的眼睛盯着那个矮小的男人。到最后，他似乎考虑出了某个结论，将视线转向了你。{/n}“他隶属于你的世界，{name}。他的命运应该由你来决定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的眼睛盯着那个矮小的男人。到最后，他似乎考虑出了某个结论，将视线转向了你。{/n}“他隶属于你的世界，{name}。他的命运应该由你来决定。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix se clavan en los del hombre, mucho menos corpulento que él. Finalmente, parece llegar a una conclusión y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Es un súbdito de su mundo, {name}. Es usted quien debe decidir su destino».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Heinrix se clavan en los del hombre, mucho menos corpulento que él. Finalmente, parece llegar a una conclusión y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Es un súbdito de su mundo, {name}. Es usted quien debe decidir su destino».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目が小柄な男の目をじっと見つめる。そしてついに、ある結論に達し、あなたへと振り返る。{/n}「彼はあなたの惑星の臣民です、{name}さん。その運命は、あなたが決めるべきです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目が小柄な男の目をじっと見つめる。そしてついに、ある結論に達し、あなたへと振り返る。{/n}「彼はあなたの惑星の臣民です、{name}さん。その運命は、あなたが決めるべきです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' durchbohrt den kleineren Mann mit seinem Blick. Als er endlich einen Entschluss gefasst zu haben scheint, wendet er sich dir zu.{/n} "Er ist ein Untertan Eurer Welt, {name}. Ihr müsst über sein Schicksal entscheiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' durchbohrt den kleineren Mann mit seinem Blick. Als er endlich einen Entschluss gefasst zu haben scheint, wendet er sich dir zu.{/n} "Er ist ein Untertan Eurer Welt, {name}. Ihr müsst über sein Schicksal entscheiden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix regarde le technoprêtre droit dans les yeux. Au bout d'un moment, il semble arriver à une conclusion et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Cet homme est un sujet de votre monde, {name}. C'est à vous de décider de son sort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix regarde le technoprêtre droit dans les yeux. Au bout d'un moment, il semble arriver à une conclusion et se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Cet homme est un sujet de votre monde, {name}. C'est à vous de décider de son sort. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ufak adamın gözlerine bakıyor. Nihayet bir karar verip sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name}, bu senin dünyanın tebaasındandır. Kaderi de senin ellerindedir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes bore into the smaller man's. At last, having reached some conclusion, he turns to you.{/n} "He is a subject of your world, {name}. It is for you to decide his fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, ufak adamın gözlerine bakıyor. Nihayet bir karar verip sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name}, bu senin dünyanın tebaasındandır. Kaderi de senin ellerindedir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
